column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Updated: Hands down best ramen. Wait times suck
column2: but that's not their fault. (Just go at a non peak time) After eating here
column3: I've trie going other places and just get disappointed. So I'll just stop going elsewhere. Pricy for ramen
column5: the taste of the food trumps everything! Their servers are consistent and awesome too
column6: I love that about this place.
